original_title: Cloudy skies over Northern, North-Central and Eastern Provinces
original_body_lines: The Forecasting Division of the National Meteorological Centre said today that cloudy skies will prevail over the Northern, North-Central and Eastern provinces. Meanwhile, they said showers would occur in the Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Northern Provinces and in the Galle, Matara and Trincomalee districts.
Light showers would occur in the North-Central and North-Western Provinces as well.
Thundershowers may occur at a few places in the Uva Province and in Ampara and Batticaloa districts during the evening or night.
Strong winds upto 45 kmph can be expected at times along the western slopes of the central hills, North-Central Province and in Puttalam, Hambantota and Trincomalee districts.
Therefore, the public is requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershower. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
